monster.name: Giant Elk
monster.languages: Giant Elk, understands Common, Elvish, Sylvan but can't speak them

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the elk moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: The majestic giant elk is rare to the point that its appearance is often taken as a foreshadowing of an important event, such as the birth of a king. Legends tell of gods that take the form of giant elk when visiting the Material Plane. Many cultures therefore believe that to hunt these creatures is to invite divine wrath.Source: Monster Manual p. 325, Storm King's Thunder
